definitions.definition: The state of being malignant or diseased .
A malignant cancer ; specifically, any neoplasm that is invasive or otherwise not benign .
That which is malign ; evil , depravity , malevolence .

main_definition: The state of being malignant or diseased .
secondary_definitions: A malignant cancer ; specifically, any neoplasm that is invasive or otherwise not benign .
That which is malign ; evil , depravity , malevolence .
